      • QueryTethys

        public String QueryTethys(String query)
                   throws Exception
        Run an XQuery, returns XML Prepends the XQuery with the Tethys default element namespace and lib: for Tethys XQuery library functions. These are defined in lib/modules/Tethys.xq of the database directory.
        Parameters:
        query -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        Exception

      • QueryJSON

        public String QueryJSON(String query,
                        int plan)
                 throws Exception
        Public class for querying an XML database with a JSON dictionary.
        Parameters:
        query - - JSON specification, see Tethys RESTful Interface manual for details.
        plan - - 0 - execute query 1 - show query plan 2 - show XQuery
        Returns:
        XML result string
        Throws:
        Exception
